A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m pretty sad about it. So much\, decades worth of\, potential and build up thrown away. I love all the Star Wars movies\, and still watch them all repeatedly...just\, woof. Years of anticipation for things hoped for never to be realized—ugh. I don’t post reviews ever but I had to say something about this one. 2.5 hours of unfulfilled hopes. The Star Wars we knew and loved is now gone. Ironically TFA represented a new hope but TLJ is certainly the empire striking back...maybe Abrams can bring about a return of what we loved for IX. - - - Saw it a second time. Liked it better the 2nd time. Middle still drags though.
